attributes.action: Force David Cameron To Trigger Artical 50 And Start United Kingdom Exit ASAP
attributes.additional_details: My evidence is the media and the government and the official records and documents the the U.K. Has won the vote to leave the EU and the Artical should be activated now
attributes.background: Today we seen the county vote to leave the EU this is a historic victory for the county however David Cameron has to trigger the Artical 50 to start our official exit. So this petition we hopfully force him to activate it straight away and not in two years time. The U.K. voted so let's leave
